items.title: 12% safeguard duty on steel products sufficient, will seek more if import create challenges: Naveen Jindal
items.description: The Directorate General of Trade Remedies (DGTR) has recommended final imposition of a safeguard duty on imports of certain flat steel products for three years to protect domestic manufacturers from a sudden jump in inbound shipments

items.title: Is the Indian bond market poised for a rebound?
items.description: Lower-than-expected revenue loss from the GST rate rationalisation and some scope for interest rate cut could be favourable factors

items.title: ITC: How does the new GST rate structure unfold for the cigarette business?
items.description: A flat GST on retail sales price will enhance pricing stability, and lower tax evasion, resulting in a predictable tax environment

items.title: Exclusive club: These few surnames dominate India's richest families, says Hurun's list
items.description: Agarwal and Gupta were the two most shared surnames by India’s richest business families, both tied at 12

items.title: Infosys board to mull share buyback proposal on September 11
items.description: If approved, this will be the first buyback of shares since 2022, when the company had okayed a proposal of Rs 9,300 crore

items.title: HUDCO to provide up to Rs 11,300 crore for infrastructure projects in Nagpur over five years
items.description: HUDCO will also extend consultancy services as well as undertake capacity building activities to meet the emerging requirements of NMRDA.
